title: The wonderfull and miraculous escape of our gracious King, from that dismal, black and gloomie defeat at Worster: together with a pattern to all true and faithfull subjects, by the five loyall and faithfull brothers, with their care and diligence, observance and obedience 8 dayes in the time of his Majesties obscurity. The tune is, come lets drink the time invites
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for F. Coles. T Vere, and W. Gilbertson,
